TOC for API::regdb
IOmodule to access the database input/output system (not related to file operations)
genemethods to access gene data, higher level than location methods head1 SYNOPSIS Methods to load and store gene data Uses Bioperl (install bioperl-live)
matrixmethods to access matrix data head1 SYNOPSIS Methods to load and store matrix data Uses Bioperl (install bioperl-live)
mutationmethods to access mutation data head1 SYNOPSIS Methods to load and store mutation data Uses Bioperl (install bioperl-live)
